snippet.title: SYLVIE MINIATURE | Maze of Mystery
snippet.description:
Link to play: https://sylvie.itch.io/sylvie-miniature
Sylvie Miniature is a 2D platformer game that follows the story of a tiny girl named Sylvie in a mysterious world destroyed by an unknown force. You must explore what's left of the world, search for hidden key combinations that unlock new abilities, and use them to find the exit.

Credits:

• sylvie: https://sylvie.itch.io/
